summary: This is an email chain regarding the status of evidence in the Epstein case, specifically mentioning corrections to thumb drives and an iPad, and requesting confirmation if anything else is missing. It involves a NYO CART Coordinator and a Senior Forensic Examiner.

persons.name: NYO CART Coordinator
persons.context: The sender of the email providing an update on Epstein evidence status, specifically noting corrections to thumb drives and an iPad.

persons.name: Senior Forensic Examiner
persons.context: The recipient of the email, being asked to confirm if anything else is missing regarding the Epstein evidence.

connections.description: Colleagues communicating about evidence status in the Epstein case, with the Coordinator updating the Examiner.

events.title: Evidence status update
events.description: An email was sent providing an updated status on Epstein evidence, specifically correcting thumb drives and an iPad.

keyFacts: The email discusses an update on Epstein evidence status, indicating ongoing investigative activities in July 2020.
Specific corrections were made to thumb drives and an iPad as part of the evidence handling.
The communication involves a NYO CART Coordinator and a Senior Forensic Examiner, highlighting forensic examination processes in the case.
